phrases: It is the beginning of a war.
You are the only person I know outside of the organization, Li-san.
Do you have any idea who that girl is?
Aniki told me she was some sort of merchandise.
Why did you bring her here if you already knew that?
I have decided to make her happy!
What are you going to do about the organization?
I do not have any other choice but to leave.
I am going to run away from Tokyo with her.
There is no way you could pull that off.
I will not know until I try!
I am an idiot who does not know how the world works,
but I believe she will never be happy if she stays here.
You do not understand anything at all.
Did Kenji do this to you?
Did he run away with the doll?
He did this at the worst possible moment.
What are you going to do?
Ask the customer to wait a little longer.
Tell him I will think about giving him a discount depending on how things turn out.
Why do you think I had the old man killed?
I am more concerned about how many officials I can extort before the turmoil subsides.
If you understand what I am saying, leave!
Do not lay a finger on the girl.
Kill the guy if you have to.
Oh, does not that sweater look cute?
Hey, are not you done shopping?
I would understand if he was buying clothes as a present for his girlfriend, but underwear and a wig?
Why do you think it is a present?
Thank you for helping me with the decision.
Li-kun, those things were not for you, were they?
A friend asked me for a favor.
He asked me to find a present for his girlfriend
since he did not have any time.
Are not you glad it was not a present for his girlfriend?
The way you were looking at him did not seem normal.
There is no way she would get very far in that outfit.
She came into the room without saying a word.
Hei, you seemed a little different today.
Are you okay with that person?
I apologize for the trouble I am causing you.
Always on the run, living in fear of pursuers who might come at any moment...
You are going to have to run for the rest of your life.
Even if you are lucky enough to find a job, how are you going to take care of her?
She is not even toilet trained.
She does not understand your words or your reasoning.
Why are you so concerned about her?
You are dressed up, are not you?
I am off to work, after all.
I do not sit around and drink all day, you know.
Li-san, do you know why Eileen came to Japan?
She is here to earn money for her brother and sister back in her homeland.
She was not able to get a decent education, which is why she does not want her siblings to be in the same situation.
That is because they are related by blood.
I was abandoned by my parents.
Eileen is not the only one.
Everyone has a reason for living.
Li-san, do not you have it as well?
Something you want to protect from the bottom of your heart...
Sorry, I said a little too much.
You cannot help being lovestruck, though.
I will take you to the station.
I will take you to Shinjuku Station.
Tickets to the first express out of here!
The earliest departure is an express bound for Matsumoto.
I am going to call Hitotsubashi-san.
This is an announcement addressed to the following customer...
Episode Eighteen A Love Song Sung from a Trash Heap... (Part Two)
It is dangerous to run out like that, Kenji.
If you are looking for the kid and the doll, they were caught.
How long have you been watching?
It is about time to pull out.
The kid's going to die and the doll's going to be sold.
When that happens, they are going to find out about your involvement.
It will be impossible for you to continue your mission.
You guys better run away at once.
If you are involved with that kid any longer, it will be seen as betrayal against the syndicate.
Are you going to report this to Huang?
What would I gain out of telling him?
I am just here to kill time,
since you never fail to amuse me.
Yes, since we were the ones at fault,
I will give you a discount.
Allow us to continue providing our services in the future.
I will open it soon enough.
It will be the last thing you will see.
Is it the doll's observer apparition?
She is saying, Kenji... will be killed...
Are you saying that the doll sent its observer apparition on its own?
The yakuza using the doll must have set a trap.
You were the one who said I seemed different today.
Never a dull moment with you.
That was stupid of you, Kenji.
You are throwing your life away for the sake of a doll.
How long are you going to continue acting delusional?
I have decided to risk my life for her sake.
I can do anything as long as I have this will.
I dare you to find a way out of this situation, then.
You are the one who said it a long time ago, Aniki.
Li-san, will you have my motorbike?
Where do you want me to go?
This is the second time you have sat in the back,
although the last time was on a motorcycle.
That was my first time on a bike,
and it was the first time I met you.
Listen, a motorcycle is not just a machine.
If you take good care of it, it will listen to your wishes.
It will never let you down.
Find something you want to protect with your life.
When you do, there is not anything in this world you will be afraid of.
You will be able to do anything.
Why did you let him go?
There was not any ammunition left in that gun,
Is there something you want to protect with your life?
I do not have anything like that.
I did in the past, though.
It might be a little too late to say this, but...
You do not have to stay with me, you know.
If you do not like me, feel free to leave whenever you want to.
It looks like a guy named Ohshita will take over the family.
The trafficking route ceased to exist the moment Hitotsubashi was killed.
There was a response from BK201?
Y-Yes, but it was really faint.
Several minutes, starting from 19:12 last night.
The exact location has not been confirmed, but it was probably Shinjuku.
He was in the vicinity after all.
Was there any other news worth mentioning during that time?
but there was a shooting incident at Shinjuku Station's south exit, believed to be part of a gang war.
When will you make your next appearance, BK201?
It is part of my job as a landlord.
Do not you know what that is?
This is a lot for one person.
I think he wanted to share this with everybody.
Can you distribute it to everyone?
That is common courtesy, you know.
The faces of those who are gone float beyond the bubble that glitters of gold.
The woman who lost her memory serves a smile.
The man who lost his love drinks a glass of despair.
His unabated indignity will not melt away,
Episode Nineteen Dreaming Shallow, Uninebriated... (Part One)
